list_definition.definition: (in an orchestra, the group of people who play) musical instruments in which the sound is produced by striking them eg drums, cymbals etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He plays (the) percussion in the orchestra

list_definition.definition: the striking of one hard object against another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A gun is fired by means of percussion.
